snippet: In the world of violent global jihad, Abu Yahya al-Libi, who U.S. officials say was killed in a drone strike Monday, was an evangelist, a philosopher and a social media rock star. He was even mentioned as a candidate to lead Al Qaeda.
abstract: In the world of violent global jihad, Abu Yahya al-Libi, who U.S. officials say was killed in a drone strike Monday, was an evangelist, a philosopher and a social media rock star. He was even mentioned as a candidate to lead Al Qaeda.

headline.main: Evangelist for Al Qaeda Said to Be Killed
